actions.committee: Senate Committee on Public Works (Subsequently: Environment and Public Works)
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works (Subsequently: Environment and Public Works).
Pursuant to S. Res. 4, Committee name changed.
Committee on Environment and Public Works discharged in Senate (Pursuant to S. Res. 4).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Rereferred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend title 23 of the United States Code, relating to highways, in order to encourage the States to establish highway assistance patrols.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to take such action as may be appropriate to encourage States to establish highway assistance patrols to assist motorists having mechanical or other problems. Requires the Secretary to conduct a study of the effectiveness of such patrols and to report the results of such study to the Congress. (Adds 23 U.S.C. 406)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 23 of the United States Code, relating to highways, in order to encourage the States to establish highway assistance patrols.
